locations: At the intersection of ${streetName} ${streetType} and ${secondStreetName} ${streetType} in ${city}, Kazakhstan
In the parking lot of ${landmark} in ${city}, Kazakhstan
On the highway between ${city} and ${secondCity}, Kazakhstan
While exiting from ${landmark} onto ${streetName} ${streetType} in ${city}, Kazakhstan

damage.vehicle: The other vehicle sustained ${severity} damage to the ${damageLocation} which was ${damageType}, along with ${additionalDamage}, ${repairability}.
damage.person: The victim sustained ${severity} ${injuryType} to the ${bodyPart}, ${treatment}, and is ${prognosis}.
damage.property: The ${propertyDescription} was ${damageType} in the accident, ${damageExtent}. ${consequences} The estimated repair cost is approximately ${estimatedCost} tenge.

carAccidentDescription: Perpetrators vehicle collided with ${collisionObject} during ${timeOfDay} in ${weatherConditions} due to ${cause}. Our clients vehicle ${car.mark} ${car.model} ${car.reg_num} (${car.vin}) sustained ${claimantDamageSeverity} damage to the ${claimantDamageLocation}. ${victimDamageDescription}
